concepts.name: result
concepts.description: Final result of the compiler interaction

concepts.name: report
concepts.natural_name: report: tell user the action result via chat
concepts.description: Report the action result to the user via chat

concepts.name: action_result
concepts.description: The result of executing the user's requested action

concepts.name: execute
concepts.natural_name: execute: perform the action based on user intent
concepts.description: Execute the action based on classified user intent

concepts.name: user_intent
concepts.description: The classified intent of the user's message

concepts.name: classify
concepts.natural_name: classify: determine what the user wants to do
concepts.description: Use LLM to classify user input into intent categories

concepts.name: user_input
concepts.description: The raw text input from the user

concepts.name: read
concepts.natural_name: read: wait for user message from chat
concepts.description: Wait for and read user input from chat

concepts.name: welcome
concepts.description: Marker indicating welcome message was shown

concepts.name: greet
concepts.natural_name: greet: display welcome message in chat
concepts.description: Display welcome message to user in chat
